Key Match Events: Charith Asalanka takes 3, Rohit Sharma scores 58 as match ends in a tie
Dunith Wellalage's rearguard 67 helped Sri Lanka post 230/8 against India at the R Premadasa Stadium on Friday.
India need 1 run from 14 balls, but Charith Asalanka bowls a delightful spell where he snap up Shivam Dube and Arshdeep Singh in back to back deliveries with India needing just 1 from 14 balls.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play, reducing the game to 20 overs per side.
